mapper.select: SELECT C.ROW_NUM, C.CMT_NO, C.BOARD_NO, C.EMP_NO, C.CREATE_DATE, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.STATE, C.DEPTH, C.GROUP_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, CMT_NO, BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, CREATE_DATE,CMT_CONTENT, STATE,DEPTH,GROUP_NO FROM COMMENTS WHERE BOARD_NO= #{boardNo}) C WHERE c.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
